column1: Art Institute of Chicago//// Last time I was here
column2: a planned extension abutting Millennium Park by starchitect Renzo Piano had not yet been completed
column3: but renderings look fantastic and feature glass and ceiling panels
column4: and an extending magic carpet floating roof. I'm not sure if it's completed yet (I am lazy to do a quick Google search) but if so
column5: it should be another architectural gem in the Chicago cityscape.
